title: Episode 256: Pinky Ring Remix (Feat. Ne-Yo)
itunes:title: Episode 256: Pinky Ring Remix (Feat. Ne-Yo)
description:
Singer/songwriter Ne-Yo opens up about reuniting with his wife Crystal. He breaks down where things went wrong, what they did to fix it, and how they’re moving forward. Ne-Yo also gives advice to all future artists planning on battling on the ‘Verzuz’ stage, as well as who he thinks will win in regards to John Legend vs. Alicia Keys. Make sure to check out his latest single, “U 2 Luv.” Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: Singer/songwriter Ne-Yo joins the ladies of Lip Service
